page.title: 10INDUSTRY
page.content: Since this area is predominently rural there is very little industry.The largest employer in the area is Whitbred and Company, who own Castle Eden brewery.This brewery was founded in 1826 by John Nimmo,the land being leased from the Burdon family.Castle Eden burn was said to supply particulary good water! since in 1826 the brewery has changed hands and been improved several times,and at present employs about 250 people.Other industry in the area consists of Watsons Windows in Wingate and small concerns such as Castle Eden eggs with connections with agriculture and farming.
